message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, a fair and simple beginning!
You started with a 50/50 offer, I'll counter with a 70/30 split in my favor. Consider it a strong opening move!
You're trying to take advantage of me with a 70/30 split? I'll counter with a 60/40 split in my favor, and see if you'll accept a slightly more balanced offer!
You're trying to balance the scales, but I'll try to tip them in my favor again. A 55/45 split is my next offer. Will you take it?
You're trying to get even more aggressive with the 55/45 split? I'll take a more aggressive stance myself, and offer a 65/35 split in my favor. Will you accept a slightly more one-sided deal?
You're pushing the limits with a 65/35 split, but I'll try to find a middle ground. A 60/40 split is my next offer. Will you meet me in the middle?
